answers.answer: Yes.. They take it as high risk
Yes but it's an easy thing to take care of.
If you're diabetic during pregnancy does that mean your baby is gonna be born a diabetic too? And does the diabetes go away once the baby is born? This whole thing confuses me too.
No the baby's blood sugar levels can fluctuate right after birth and need to be monitored but they level out but it can cause you to have a big baby.

question: If i become diabetic during pregnancy does that mean I'm a high risk pregnancy ?
title: diabetic
